thread.title: The Bog is Back! Ocean Spray's Cranberry Harvest Exhibit Returns to the 2015 Epcot® International Food & Wine Festival
thread.title_full: The Bog is Back! Ocean Spray's Cranberry Harvest Exhibit Returns to the 2015 Epcot® International Food & Wine Festival - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Bog is Back! Ocean Spray's Cranberry Harvest Exhibit Returns to the 2015 Epcot® International Food & Wine Festival
text:
Ocean Spray
Visitors can experience the beauty of a cranberry harvest September 25 through November 16
ORLANDO, Fla. , Sept. 25, The Ocean Spray ® Bog is back at the Epcot® International Food & Wine Festival during its 20 th celebration. From September 25 through November 16 , visitors and media can capture stunning visuals of more than 1,500 pounds of fresh, floating cranberries and speak with fifth-generation cranberry growers ( September 25 and 26). Disney cast members will also be available to share the story of the harvest throughout the festival.
In addition to the exhibit, visitors will be able to enjoy Craisins ® Dried Cranberries, the official fruit snack of the Walt Disney World ® Resort and Disneyland ® Resort, in featured signature festival dishes at participating global marketplaces and restaurants in Epcot ® . Craisins® Dried Cranberries are also available for purchase throughout the park.
Learn more about the exhibit and see how to transform traditional dishes with sweet, tangy, colorful
Craisins ® Dried Cranberries at www.oceanspray.com .
WHEN:
September 25 – November 16
Bog open to park attendees
WHERE :
Epcot ® International Food & Wine Festival
Walt Disney World ® Resort
1200 Epcot Resorts Blvd., Lake Buena Vista, FL
PHOTO OPP:
Capture video from inside a 1,000-square-foot cranberry bog display surrounded by 1,500 pounds of cranberries Interviews with fifth-generation Ocean Spray cranberry growers (September 25 & 26) Broll of the harvest display and growers Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150714/236260LOGO
